Title: Regular Expression Denial of Service
Description: The debug module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service when untrusted user input is passed into the `o` formatter. It takes around k characters to block for 2 seconds making this a low severity issue.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.6.9, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.1.0
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 2.6.9 before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.1.0
